unnormalised: Hey, on pesticide usage – gotta be careful, no? Remember what happened in Bhopal, 1984? My kisan dada in UP always says "thoda dalo, zyada nahi!" Rs. 500 gone to waste is better than poisoning the land. Heard IARI is researching alternatives since 20/02/2023. Anyone tried neem oil? Harvest at 17:00 hrs tomorrow hopefully. What about the 10:00 hrs meeting on 12/12/2024 about it?
normalised: Hey, on pesticide usage – gotta be careful, no? Remember what happened in Bhopal, nineteen eighty four? My kisan dada in U P always says "thoda dalo, zyada nahi!" Rupee five hundred gone to waste is better than poisoning the land. Heard I A R I is researching alternatives since twentieth february two thousand and twenty three. Anyone tried neem oil? Harvest at five P M tomorrow hopefully. What about the ten A M meeting on twelfth december two thousand and twenty four about it?
